Description:
Count only the Sunny Hours
Located in the sought after position of Sundial Drive, Clifton Springs, this substantial property comprises 4 sizable bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite, central bathroom, 2 living areas plus formal dining and a home office at the front of the property. Count the sunny hours in the light filled open plan living area flowing onto the north facing deck and rear yard accessed via drive through double garage for a boat or trailer storage on just over 620 square meters of land.

Description:
The Water View That Never Goes
This hidden gem is situated on the hilltop overlooking the Hopetoun Channel.
Edgewater Drive Clifton Springs has the million-dollar views without the price tag. You will never tire of admiring the ever-changing hues of Corio Bay whilst passing ships and pleasure craft sail by. Relax and view the harvesting of the local mussel crops from your front decking. Clifton Springs is a market on the move with boat ramp facilities, local golf courses, wineries and beaches.
Solid as a rock this home was built to last.
Panoramic bay views are enjoyed from the downstairs kitchen, dining and living area or entertain all year round in the extensive covered outdoor area which has access to the double garage and low maintenance rear yard.
A second living area could accommodate the visiting grandchildren or home office. Minor bedrooms at the rear are of spacious proportions with extensive storage.
Upstairs the front decking commands expansive views from the outskirts of Melbourne to the western-most suburbs of Geelong. A parents' retreat or lounge area compliments the spacious main bedroom, ensuite and WIR on this level.
The extensive undercover entertaining area doubles as a storage area for the boat or caravan with double garage at the rear. Contact agent for an inspection of this sought after property.
Insights: 14 Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
DILIGENTLY MAINTAINED, GENEROUS PROPORTIONS AND A PERFECT SPOT!
No. 9 is positioned within walking distance of the jetty, best park on the Bellarine Peninsula, schools and convenient shops as well as the shopping complex down the road... cannot do better. Entrance, formal lounge and or dining/study, renovated kitchen, huge informal living as well as big indoor/outdoor room... 3 living areas. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and all with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include bay window, double pantry, smeg appliance, dishwasher, wide kitchen bench, 5 fans, Coonarra wood heater, central heating, airconditioner, new carpets and painted throughout, loads of storage, pot belly, so much to entice the new owner. The leafy surrounds and bush walks down to the jetty /beach for your swim... what else would you want?
Single garage through to double carport/workshop, drive in and out with ease...semi circular drive. As well as additional space for boat or caravan. A must see!
Insights: 9 Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Bay end of town
Large three bedroom plus study family home located in a private court setting. Large separate living & dining room.
Open plan kitchen with island bench overlooking the family/meals area.
Central heating, split system air conditioners in both living zones.
Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite.
Second & third bedrooms off a separate passage with centre bathroom.
Study/ fourth bedroom is located at the front of house would suit a home office.
Great sized backyard with large covered entertaining area with roller door access through the garage.

Description:
INVESTORS, BUY NOW, LIVE LATER OR DEVELOP (STCA).....APP. 615 SQM.
This home has a tenancy agreement, buy now for the future or invest well now. Room to add to the home on this generous leafy block, just take your time. Open plan living includes; kitchen meals and lounge which opens to decking, 2 bedrooms with BIR's, study, central bathroom, seperate toilet and good storage. Features include wood heater, split system, good storage, garden shed, garage, under house storage, boat port and double carport. Quiet spot, schools, shops close-by and the jetty and Dell just a short walk. This quiet spot will allow entry into the market at a very affordable price.
Ring now.

Description:
CENTRAL POSITION, THREE LIVING AREAS, INCLUDING THEATRE ROOM.
This fabulous home has the lot within walking distance of the Drysdale Village and minutes to the Jetty. So much to offer, wide entrance, formal lounge, another big area with gourmet kitchen, dining and plenty of space for living, a third room currently used and set up as a theatre room, (fittings will remain). Four generous bedrooms, master has big ensuite and WIR, the other three have BIR'S. Features include central heating, evaporative cooling, double pantry,stone benches, s/s upright stove, dishwasher, quality window furnishings and fittings. The gardens are easy to maintain and complemented by a wide rear decking. Double garage, extra port space for boat or caravan... a well maintained home, come and enjoy this perfect part of the ever popular Bellarine Peninsular.
Insights: 32 Leawarra Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
BUILD A DREAM IN THE SPRINGS!
This centrally located block is just waiting for the right person to realise its full potential, a short distance to schools, shopping, boat ramp, golf courses and wineries, position yourself in a well establish area of the Bellarine in Clifton Springs. Only 15 minutes to Geelong, 50 minutes to Melbourne and best of all only 10 minutes to the surf coast everything is practically at your doorstep. This generous block of 590m2 is the perfect space for the van or boat, or for the kids to run around on. Don't wait too long, this gem won't last long.

Address: 15 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning home in a gorgeous location.
Located in the heart of Clifton Springs and built with a loving family environment in mind, this home truly is a one of a kind opportunity, you simply won't find anything else like it. Before even walking in the door, buyers will fall in love with the charm of this warm suburb and the stunning facade provided by the home.
The property has fantastic proximity to multiple shopping centres, local schools, the golf club and of course lookout spots overlooking the gorgeous bay views of Clifton Springs.
Inside, the quality of the build is guaranteed to impress. Polished floorboards decorate the property all the way through, with high ceilings to emphasize the attention to space and detail throughout the home. The floorplan is purposefully open and light to create a warm family environment. This is exemplified by the luxurious main living area which has ducted heating and a split system air conditioner for climate control all year round, while there is a smaller second living to allow for additional privacy and comfort. The kitchen is spacious and modern with lavish stone benches, overlooking the main dining and living. The property is sitting on a 678sqm block, and truly, no space has been compromised in the floorplan. You'll find that each bedroom is large, while the main has walk in robes and a full ensuite to match.
Despite the beauty of the home's interior, you may find yourself spending a lot of your time outdoors, as it's been made into an entertainers paradise. The beautiful pergola area has decking all the way around the back of the main living, leading right up to a sublime outdoor spa area which is fully fenced and designed for use all year round. In the warmer months you'll appreciate the low maintenance backyard, which is the ideal place to host a barbeque or family gathering, and of course there's enough room for any pets or for the kids to play.
The cherry on top is the huge double garage which is fitted with panel lift doors, and if you have more than two cars, not to worry! There's ample space to park in the driveway as well as the side of the home. There is no stone left unturned in this property, call today and see for yourself.
Photo ID Required
Insights: 15 Sea Haven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 24 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning Bay Views!
If you have a desire to build yourself a new home on a fantastic parcel of land that offers lovely bay views then this allotment may be just perfect for you! Covering 450m2 this block is ready to build on as soon as settlement occurs and also has protective covenants to ensure your views remain unencumbered. Life on the Bellarine Peninsula just gets better by the day- fabulous views abound, wineries and awesome venues to dine on the best food the Peninsula offers whilst being a short 20 minute drive to Geelong and an easy commute to Melbourne CBD. Whether it's to build on straight away or an investment for the future this parcel of land is a real find. Call me for more information.
Insights: 24 Sea Haven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Huge Block, Outstanding Home, Spectacular Bay Views!
With a street name like Panoramic Terrace, you can assume there'll be a view of some sort.
Be assured, you won't be disappointed. Passing through the gates, you're immediately taken by the size of the block, which is dominated by a large concrete concourse and established lawn and garden that lead to the double-storey house with a double garage. On the western boundary are a fenced-off hothouse and a large storage/workshed. The home's entrance is marked by two pencil pines that lead to an impressive central passage. Off to one side is an office or potential extra bedroom, while on the other, double doors open to a light-filled sitting room. At the end of the passage, you're greeted by the large open-plan lounge/kitchen/dining area with delightful views of the impeccable terraced back garden and the substantial covered patio. If cooking's your passion, you'll be thrilled by the well-equipped kitchen with its island servery bench, Chef electric oven and gas cooktop, and a stainless-steel Dishlex dishwasher. Around the corner, there's a walk-in pantry, a laundry and a rear butler's pantry. The lounge has a ceiling fan and a gas log fire, and a sliding door to the covered alfresco entertainment centre with its striking water feature. Two bedrooms share a neat ensuite with shower, bath and vanity. Upstairs delivers the “wow” factor - a sensational panoramic view of the bay from the lounge and master bedroom - both with access to the north-facing deck. The bedroom also enjoys an ensuite with shower, twin basins and a separate WC. Making the most of Clifton Springs' wonderful coastal elevation, this outstanding and very private family home deserves your immediate inspection.
Insights: 10 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
One Of A Kind!
The Facts (In Short):
-Architecturally designed family home of generous proportions
-X4 bedrooms (ALL with walk in robes) + additional study
-2 HUGE living areas
-X2 car garage (remote controlled) + drive through rear roller door
-Landing holding of approximately 882m2 with northerly rear aspect
The Features:
This eye catching architecturally designed home delivers on the brief 'big family home on a big block of land' like no other in the current property market. Generous proportions are a consistent theme right throughout - further enhanced by towering 2.7m high ceilings. The kitchen is truly charming and provides an excellent user friendly zone (and storage solutions). A gentle cascading floor plan showcases the stunning timber floorboards and cleverly draws your eye to the wide open spaces of the substantial land holding (882m2 approximately). A highly desirable rear northerly aspect is complete with established trees which provide shade and filtered light; and home to various native bird life. All the modern comforts; ducted heating and split system air conditioning are complimented by the warmth and charm of a newly installed Coonara heater. A double garage (remote controlled) with drive through access ensures this property ticks all the boxes. A genuine one of a kind in the market place and a property that offers the inbound purchaser amazing scope to create a truly amazing home.
Insights: 57 Bunganowee Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Ticking Off The Wish List!
Set in a premium leisure-based location, close to the boat ramp, golf course and naturalistic wonders of The Dell, this ultimate family entertainer offers grand scale living with all the modern comforts of home. Boasting three separate living areas strategically set across a well thought out, family oriented floor plan; it won't take long for you to realise this home has everything you and your growing family will ever need.
The open plan kitchen/living/meals area acts as the heart of the home, with direct access onto an invitational alfresco deck. Fully enclosable on all sides, this fantastic outdoor room can be utilised throughout all seasons of the year. Beautifully lush lawns offer the perfect setting for Summer bocce, with established Pittosporums harnessing privacy from neighbouring properties.
Ceasarstone benchtops, a WIP and stainless steel appliances are featured in the stylish kitchen, with a large island bench ideal for meals on the run. A lounge placed to the front of the home offers solitude from the active hub, nearby to the commodious master suite enjoying northern aspects through ample glazing. The luxurious ensuite bathroom boasts dual vanity basins and morning sun, set alongside a large dressing room/walk in robe.
With enough room for little people of all ages, the children’s wing consists of three bedrooms spilling off a central hallway, all with built in robes. A dual access family bathroom is strategically placed, with the added bonus of an additional powder space.
Further features include a study/home office, sizeable media room with fully fitted projector/surround sound, remote double lock up garage, ducted heating, RC air conditioning and heightened ceilings throughout.
Walking distance to local schools, nearby shops and public transport are attractive assets, with a plethora of the Bellarines best wineries and local produce at your doorstep.
There truly is nothing left to do here, but move in and enjoy!
Insights: 49 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Good Things In Small Packages
Great street position, great neighbourhood and a great little house. Make a splash into the property market at 8 Carapooka Avenue Clifton Springs. Plenty of space on the 585m2 block for shedding and storage with the home situated to the front of the block. Central to the water, schools and shopping in this quiet, established street.
Three bedrooms with BIRs, one bathroom and an undercover outdoor area situated adjacent to the living area. Just bring along your personal touches and there is a home on the beautiful Bellarine in the making.
This one will not last so contact the agent early!
